User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user within the DIPRINT RD Tracker system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity (matches Firebase Auth UID).

departmentId.description: Reference to Department. (Relationship: Department 1:N User). Assigned by an administrator.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the user profile was created.

Department.title: Department
Department.description: Represents a department within the DIPRINT RD organization.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Department entity.

Job.title: Job
Job.description: Represents a print job within the DIPRINT RD system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Job entity.

clientName.description: Name of the client for this specific job.

status.description: The current status of the job, typically matching a Department name.

priority.description: The priority level of the job.

departmentId.description: The ID of the department that currently 'owns' or is working on the job.

approvalUrl.description: URL to the client's uploaded approval file.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the job was created (entry date and time).

JobUpdate.title: JobUpdate
JobUpdate.description: Represents an audit log entry or an event related to a job.

id.description: Unique identifier for the JobUpdate entity.

userId.description: ID of the user who performed the action.

departmentId.description: Denormalized department ID from the user making the update for authorization.

comment.description: Comment or description of the action taken.

newStatus.description: The new status of the job, if it was changed.

newPriority.description: The new priority of the job, if it was changed.

fileUrl.description: URL to a file associated with this update (legacy, for one file).

fileUrls.description: URLs to files associated with this update.

definition.description: Stores user profiles. The `rol` field determines access level ('dueño' or 'empleado'). `departmentId` is assigned by an Admin.
Stores department information. Managed by Admins, but readable by all authenticated users.
Stores individual job information. The `departmentId` field is used for access control.
Serves as the audit log ('audit_logs') for each job, recording all actions.
